definitions.definition: A local government district with borough status in Lancashire , England .
A river in Pendle borough , Lancashire , known as Pendle Water, which flows into the River Calder (tributary of the Ribble ).

main_definition: A local government district with borough status in Lancashire , England .
secondary_definitions: A river in Pendle borough , Lancashire , known as Pendle Water, which flows into the River Calder (tributary of the Ribble ).
